verses.verse: Now these are the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> who went up <WH5927> with Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel, <WH7597> and Jeshua: <WH3442> Seraiah, <WH8304> Jeremiah, <WH3414> Ezra, <WH5830>
Amariah, <WH568> Malluch, <WH4409> Hattush, <WH2407>
Shecaniah, <WH7935> Rehum, <WH7348> Meremoth, <WH4822>
Iddo, <WH5714> Ginnethoi, <WH1599> Abijah, <WH29>
Mijamin, <WH4326> Maadiah, <WH4573> Bilgah, <WH1083>
Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Joiarib, <WH3114> Jedaiah. <WH3048>
Sallu, <WH5543> Amok, <WH5987> Hilkiah, <WH2518> Jedaiah. <WH3048> These were the chiefs <WH7218> of the priests <WH3548> and of their brothers <WH251> in the days <WH3117> of Jeshua. <WH3442>

Moreover the Levites: <WH3881> Jeshua, <WH3442> Binnui, <WH1131> Kadmiel, <WH6934> Sherebiah, <WH8274> Judah, <WH3063> and Mattaniah, <WH4983> who was over the thanksgiving, <WH1960> he and his brothers. <WH251>
Also Bakbukiah <WH1229> and Unno, <WH6042> their brothers, <WH251> were over against them according to their offices. <WH4931>

Jeshua <WH3442> became the father <WH3205> of Joiakim, <WH3113> and Joiakim <WH3113> became the father <WH3205> of Eliashib, <WH475> and Eliashib <WH475> became the father <WH3205> of Joiada, <WH3111>
and Joiada <WH3111> became the father <WH3205> of Jonathan, <WH3129> and Jonathan <WH3129> became the father <WH3205> of Jaddua. <WH3037>
In the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> were priests, <WH3548> heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households: <WH8304> of Seraiah, Meraiah; <WH4811> of Jeremiah, <WH3414> Hananiah; <WH2608>
of Ezra, <WH5830> Meshullam; <WH4918> of Amariah, <WH568> Jehohanan; <WH3076>
of Malluchi, <WH4409> Jonathan; <WH3129> of Shebaniah, <WH7645> Joseph; <WH3130>
of Harim, <WH2766> Adna; <WH5733> of Meraioth, <WH4812> Helkai; <WH2517>
of Iddo, <WH5714> Zechariah; <WH2148> of Ginnethon, <WH1599> Meshullam; <WH4918>
of Abijah, <WH29> Zichri; <WH2147> of Miniamin, <WH4509> of Moadiah, <WH4153> Piltai; <WH6408>
of Bilgah, <WH1083> Shammua; <WH8051> of Shemaiah, <WH8098> Jehonathan; <WH3083>
and of Joiarib, <WH3114> Mattenai; <WH4982> of Jedaiah, <WH3048> Uzzi; <WH5813>
of Sallai, <WH5543> Kallai; <WH7040> of Amok, <WH5987> Eber; <WH5677>
of Hilkiah, <WH2518> Hashabiah; <WH2811> of Jedaiah, <WH3048> Nethanel. <WH5417>

As for the Levites, <WH3881> in the days <WH3117> of Eliashib, <WH475> Joiada, <WH3111> and Johanan, <WH3110> and Jaddua, <WH3037> there were recorded <WH3789> the heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households; <WH3548> also the priests, in the reign <WH4438> of Darius <WH1867> the Persian. <WH6542>

The sons <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households, <WH3789> were written in the book <WH5612> of the chronicles, <WH1697> even until the days <WH3117> of Johanan <WH3110> the son <WH1121> of Eliashib. <WH475>

The chiefs <WH7218> of the Levites: <WH3881> Hashabiah, <WH2811> Sherebiah, <WH8274> and Jeshua <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Kadmiel, <WH6934> with their brothers <WH251> over against them, <WH1984> to praise and give thanks, <WH1984> according to the commandment <WH4687> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of God, <WH430> watch <WH4929> next <WH5980> to watch. <WH4929>

Mattaniah, <WH4983> and Bakbukiah, <WH1229> Obadiah, <WH5662> Meshullam, <WH4918> Talmon, <WH2929> Akkub, <WH6126> were porters <WH7778> keeping <WH8104> the watch <WH4929> at the storehouses <WH624> of the gates. <WH8179>

These were in the days <WH3117> of Joiakim <WH3113> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua, <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Jozadak, <WH3136> and in the days <WH3117> of Nehemiah <WH5166> the governor, <WH6346> and of Ezra <WH5830> the priest <WH3548> the scribe. <WH5608>

At the dedication <WH2598> of the wall <WH2346> of Jerusalem <WH3389> they sought <WH1245> the Levites <WH3881> out of all their places, <WH4725> to bring <WH935> them to Jerusalem, <WH3389> to keep <WH6213> the dedication <WH2598> with gladness, <WH8057> both with giving thanks, <WH8426> and with singing, <WH7892> with cymbals, <WH4700> stringed instruments, <WH5035> and with harps. <WH3658>

The sons <WH1121> of the singers <WH7891> gathered themselves together, <WH622> both out of the plain <WH3603> around <WH5439> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and from the villages <WH2691> of the Netophathites; <WH5200>

also from Beth <WH1004> Gilgal, <WH1537> and out of the fields <WH7704> of Geba <WH1387> and Azmaveth: <WH5820> for the singers <WH7891> had built <WH1129> them villages <WH2691> around <WH5439> Jerusalem. <WH3389>
The priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> purified <WH2891> themselves; <WH2891> and they purified the people, <WH5971> and the gates, <WH8179> and the wall. <WH2346>

Then I brought up <WH5927> the princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> on the wall, <WH2346> and appointed <WH5975> two <WH8147> great <WH1419> companies who gave thanks <WH8426> and went in procession. <WH8418> One went on the right hand <WH3225> on the wall <WH2346> toward the dung <WH830> gate; <WH8179>
and after <WH310> them went <WH3212> Hoshaiah, <WH1955> and half <WH2677> of the princes <WH8269> of Judah, <WH3063>
and Azariah, <WH5838> Ezra, <WH5830> and Meshullam, <WH4918>
Judah, <WH3063> and Benjamin, <WH1144> and Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Jeremiah, <WH3414>

and certain of the priests <WH3548>' sons <WH1121> with trumpets: <WH2689> Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Jonathan, <WH3129> the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah, <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah, <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Micaiah, <WH4320> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur, <WH2139> the son <WH1121> of Asaph; <WH623>

and his brothers, <WH251> Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Azarel, <WH5832> Milalai, <WH4450> Gilalai, <WH1562> Maai, <WH4597> Nethanel, <WH5417> and Judah, <WH3063> Hanani, <WH2607> with the musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of David <WH1732> the man <WH376> of God; <WH430> and Ezra <WH5830> the scribe <WH5608> was before them. <WH6440>

By the spring <WH5869> gate, <WH8179> and straight before them, <WH5927> they went up by the stairs <WH4609> of the city <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> at the ascent <WH4608> of the wall, <WH2346> above the house <WH1004> of David, <WH1732> even to the water <WH4325> gate <WH8179> eastward. <WH4217>

The other <WH8145> company of those who gave thanks <WH8426> went <WH1980> to meet <WH4136> them, <WH310> and I after them, <WH2677> with the half of the people, <WH5971> on the wall, <WH2346> above the tower <WH4026> of the furnaces, <WH8574> even to the broad <WH7342> wall, <WH2346>

and above the gate <WH8179> of Ephraim, <WH669> and by the old <WH3465> gate, <WH8179> and by the fish <WH1709> gate, <WH8179> and the tower <WH4026> of Hananel, <WH2606> and the tower <WH4026> of Hammeah, <WH3968> even to the sheep <WH6629> gate: <WH8179> and they stood still <WH5975> in the gate <WH8179> of the guard. <WH4307>
So stood <WH5975> the two <WH8147> companies of those who gave thanks <WH8426> in the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430> and I, <WH2677> and the half of the rulers with me; <WH5461>
and the priests, <WH3548> Eliakim, <WH471> Maaseiah, <WH4641> Miniamin, <WH4509> Micaiah, <WH4320> Elioenai, <WH454> Zechariah, <WH2148> and Hananiah, <WH2608> with trumpets; <WH2689>

and Maaseiah, <WH4641> and Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Eleazar, <WH499> and Uzzi, <WH5813> and Jehohanan, <WH3076> and Malchijah, <WH4441> and Elam, <WH5867> and Ezer. <WH5829> The singers <WH7891> sang loud, <WH8085> with Jezrahiah <WH3156> their overseer. <WH6496>

They offered <WH2076> great <WH1419> sacrifices <WH2077> that day, <WH3117> and rejoiced; <WH8055> for God <WH430> had made them rejoice <WH8055> with great <WH1419> joy; <WH8057> and the women <WH802> also and the children <WH3206> rejoiced: <WH8055> so that the joy <WH8057> of Jerusalem <WH3389> was heard <WH8085> even afar off. <WH7350>

On that day <WH3117> were men <WH582> appointed <WH6485> over the rooms <WH5393> for the treasures, <WH214> for the wave offerings, <WH8641> for the first fruits, <WH7225> and for the tithes, <WH4643> to gather <WH3664> into them, <WH7704> according to the fields of the cities, <WH5892> the portions <WH4521> appointed by the law <WH8451> for the priests <WH3548> and Levites: <WH3881> for Judah <WH3063> rejoiced <WH8057> for the priests <WH3548> and for the Levites <WH3881> who waited. <WH5975>

They performed <WH8104> the duty <WH4931> of their God, <WH430> and the duty <WH4931> of the purification, <WH2893> and so did the singers <WH7891> and the porters, <WH7778> according to the commandment <WH4687> of David, <WH1732> and of Solomon <WH8010> his son. <WH1121>

For in the days <WH3117> of David <WH1732> and Asaph <WH623> of old <WH6924> there was a chief <WH7218> of the singers, <WH7891> and songs <WH7892> of praise <WH8416> and thanksgiving <WH3034> to God. <WH430>

All Israel <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of Zerubbabel, <WH2216> and in the days <WH3117> of Nehemiah, <WH5166> gave <WH5414> the portions <WH4521> of the singers <WH7891> and the porters, <WH7778> as every day <WH3117> required: <WH1697> and they set apart <WH6942> that which was for the Levites; <WH3881> and the Levites <WH3881> set apart <WH6942> that which was for the sons <WH1121> of Aaron. <WH175>
